org.dspace.curate

Class WorkflowCuratorServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dspace.curate.WorkflowCuratorServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowCuratorService

    public class WorkflowCuratorServiceImpl
extends Object
implements WorkflowCuratorService
    WorkflowCurator manages interactions between curation and workflow. Specifically, it is invoked in WorkflowManager to allow the performance of curation tasks during workflow.
    Author:
    richardrodgers
